title: Two MoMA employees stabbed by man whose membership was revoked, police say; investigation ongoing - WABC-TV
content:
1. Two MoMA employees stabbed by man whose membership was revoked, police say; investigation ongoing  WABC-TV
  2. New York's Museum of Modern Art evacuated after two people were stabbed inside, police say  CNN
  3. Search for suspect continues following double stabbing inside Museum of Modern Art  CBS New York
  4. MoMA Patron, Denied Entry, Stabs Two Employees  The New York Times
  5. 2 employees stabbed at MoMA by man whose membership was revoked  New York Post
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News
description: Police say the suspect was a member of the museum and had just received a letter revoking his membership a day prior. The man wanted to see a film and jumped the reception desk and proceeded to attack and stab the employees.
